short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wanna be Tailwind Ninja use Tailwind Ninja browser extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hello to All!

Want to minimise the time needed to transition your website from CSS to Tailwind.

Are you a Web developer then? You are aware that designing one's web components may require a lot of your time.

Tailwind Ninja, which acts as your assistant rather than writing all the code by itself, speeds up development and increases productivity.

Easy as:
1. Click the extension icon
2. Hover on the element you want to convert
3. Click V/G to get the tailwind CSS of Outlined Element
4. Hooray!! Create the exact same element for your own

Features:
1. Hover an element to view its converted Tailwind CSS Classes
2. Also displays the styles that are missing from TailwindCSS.
